Carotid_sinus_massage.text:
Ideal duration of 15 seconds
[1]
Auscultate to rule out bruits in carotid artery before performing
Perform ONE side at a time
Perform with caution in elderly patients and those with a history of cardiovascular or neurologic events, though the complication rate is low

Reverse_valsalva.text:
First described in a 2020 case series from France by Gaudart, et al.
[3]
Initial data scant but promising with 10/11 cardioverting to normal sinus rhythm, including 4 who had failed the modified Valsalva maneuver

Procedure.text:

Pinch nose and close mouth tightly
